title: The Financial and Economic Crisis - Collection 31
description:
The Financial and Economic Crisis - Collection 31:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Aronoff - The Financial Crisis Reconsidered; the Mercantilist Origins of Secular Stagnation and Boom-Bust Cycles (2016)

-  Basu & Dalal - The Scam; from Harshad Mehta to Ketan Parekh, 3e 8p (2014)

-  Clarey - Behind the Housing Crash; Confessions from an Insider (2008)

-  Davis et al - What They Do with Your Money; How the Financial System Fails Us and Hot to Fix It (2016)

-  De Ville & Vermeiren - Rising Powers and Economic Crisis in the Euro Area (2016)

-  Dillian - Street Freak, a Memoir; Money and Madness at Lehman Brothers (2011)

-  Dion et al (Eds.) - Financial Crimes; Psychological, Technological, and Ethical Issues (2016)

-  Ernstberger - Crisis, Debt, and Default; the Effects of Time Preference, Information, and Coordination (2016)

-  Felton & Reinhart (Eds.) - The First Global Financial Crisis of the 21st Century (2008)

-  Felton & Reinhart (Eds.) - The First Global Financial Crisis of the 21st Century, Part II (2009)

-  Foroohar - Makers and Takers; the Rise of Finance and the Fall of American Business (2016)

-  Galbraith - Welcome to the Poisoned Chalice; the Destruction of Greece and the Future of Europe (2016)

-  Guzman et al (Eds.) - Too Little, Too Late; the Quest to Resolve Sovereign Debt Crises (2016)

-  Hein et al (Eds.) - Financialisation and the Financial and Economic Crises; Country Issues (2016)

-  Johnsen - Bringing Down the Banking System; Lessons from Iceland (2016)

-  Labini - Science and the Economic Crisis; Impact on Science, Lessons from Science (2016)

-  Lewis - Boomerang; the Meltdown Tour (2011)

-  Lorenzi & Berrebi - A Violent World; Modern Threats to Economic Stability (2016)

-  Maharidge - Someplace Like America; Tales from the New Great Depression (2013)

-  Mazarr - Rethinking Risk in National Security; Lessons of the Financial Crisis for Risk Management (2016)

-  Michailidou - The Inexorable Evolution of Financialisation; Financial Crises in Emerging Markets (2016)

-  Minsky - Can 'It' Happen Again; Essays on Instability and Finance (2016)

-  Nguyen - Preventing Corporate Fiascos; a Systemic Approach (2016)

-  Pelaez & Pelaez - Financial Regulation after the Global Recession (2009)

-  Pelgidis & Mitsopoulos - Who's to Blame for Greece; Austerity in Charge of Saving a Broken Economy (2016)

-  Poley - The Devil's Riches; a Modern History of Greed (2016)

-  Porras - Bubbles & Contagion in Financial Markets; Vol. 1, An Integrative View (2016)

-  Powell - The Trader's Guide to the Euro Area; Economic Indicators, the ECB and the Euro Crisis (2013)

-  Preston - England after the Great Recession; Tracking the Political and Cultural Consequences of the Crisis (2012)

-  Rechtschaggen - Capital Market, Derivatives and the Law; Evolution After Crisis, 2e (2014)

-  Stiglitz & Heymann (Eds.) - Life After Debt; the Origins and Resolutions of Debt Crises (2014)

-  Subasat (Ed.) - The Great Financial Meltdown; Systemic, Conjunctural or Policy Created (2016)

-  Thomakos et al (Eds.) - A Financial Crisis Manual; Reflections and the Road Ahead (2015)

-  Wallach - To the Edge; Legality, Legitimacy, and the Responses to the 2008 Financial Crisis (2015)

-  Wolfe - The Coming Financial Crisis; a Look behind the Wizard's Curtain (2016)
